name: Tony Curtis
spouse: Janet Leigh,  (m. 1951–1962; divorced)  Christine Kaufmann,  (m. 1963–1968; divorced)  Leslie Allen,  (m. 1968–1982; divorced)  Lisa Deutsch,  (m. 1993–1994; divorced)  Jill Vandenberg,  (m. 1998–2010; his death)
